flawed_nl_solution:
There are 5-1=<<5-1=9>>9 more lions each month.
There will be 9*12=<<9*12=108>>108 more lions after 1 year.
There will be 100+108=<<100+108=208>>208 lions in Londolozi after 1 year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
